title: OrderItem
description: An order item is a line of an order. It includes the quantity and shipping details of a bought offer.

allOf.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things such as quantities, structured values, etc.

orderDelivery.description: The delivery of the parcel related to this order or order item.

orderItemNumber.description: The identifier of the order item.

orderItemStatus.description: The current status of the order item.

orderQuantity.description: The number of the item ordered. If the property is not set, assume the quantity is one.
